Package com.github.yellowstonegames.glyph

Class GlidingGlyph

java.lang.Object
com.github.yellowstonegames.glyph.GlidingGlyph
public class GlidingGlyph extends Object
A single long that a Font can render as a glyph with color and styles, given a location that can smoothly change as a CoordGlider. May optionally have an unchanging or a changing rotation.
